doc: On June 23rd I got an alert of a certificate set to expire on July 21st, 28 days later. I use a daily renewal cronjob that uses the letsencrypt module with a "remaining_days" of 30, so it should have activated 2 days ago.

As there were only 28 days to expiration, it should have issued 'challenge_data'

'challenge_data' was not created because the module returns "cert_days = 56"
